encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Popular Violence and the Stability of Roman Alexandria, 30 BC-AD 215. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud

series.title: Bulletin de la Société [Royale] d'Archéologie d'Alexandrie
BSAA

bibl.note: Suggests a revisionist interpretation: the conventional view of an Alexandria out of control cannot stand on the current body of evidence. - Alexandrian Disturbances from Augustus's Conquest to Caracalla's Massacre, 30 BC-AD 215. - Comparanda: Roman Riots from Octavian to Vespasian, 31 BC-AD 69. - Discussion. - Conclusion.
